basics.name: PHAM VU TUAN
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Software Engineer, based in Singapore. My focus and interest is on back-end software development.

education.award: Dean’s List AY2016-17 – Top 5% of the cohort with excellent academic performance.

highlights: Work as a back-end software engineer at Shopee - A leading e-commerce platform in Greater Southeast Asia.
Develop and maintain Shopee Payment Module to integrate multiple payment solutions into Shopee platform.
Maintain core business logic (Payment & Checkout) using Django, MySQL, Redis, RabbitMQ, Mesos, Docker.
Worked in Platform team to develop and maintain global streaming web services.
Built, developed and maintained core services using Go, Redis, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, Docker.
Worked in Global Dispute Processing, a core processing team under Visa Network Processing division.
Developed an internal tool to help monitoring of Oracle Coherence Distributed Cache and CloverETL jobs in development/QA/production servers.
Gained hands-on experience in software development using Spring and ReactJS.
Migrated codebase from Helix framework to Raptor framework – PayPal’s customized Spring framework to develop Java RESTful Web Services.
Cleaned up legacy service calls from Financial Instruments Management Web Service.
Migrated functional tests from C++ API to Java API using TestNG framework.

projects.name: Jenkins Project - Open Source Developer
highlights: Contribute to various areas in Jenkins: core, infra, remoting and plugins.
Maintain Remoting Kafka Plugin - Jenkins plugin that helps connecting agents to Jenkins master over Kafka.

projects.name: Jenkins Project - Google Summer of Code 2018 Participant
highlights: Got selected as Student Developer in Google Summer of Code 2018 to work in Jenkins organization.
Developed Remoting Kafka Plugin - Jenkins plugin that helps connecting agents to Jenkins master over Kafka.
Presented Remoting Kafka Plugin at DevOps World | Jenkins World 2018 in San Francisco.
